snippet: The Paris prosecutor’s office said the young Frenchmen, who were arrested Monday, had been inspired by an ISIS video and contacts with a fighter in Syria.
lead_paragraph: The Paris prosecutor’s office said the young Frenchmen, who were arrested Monday, had been inspired by an ISIS video and contacts with a fighter in Syria.

headline.main: 3 in France Accused of Plotting a Beheading at a Naval Base

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
